Quiz.title: Marathon Preparation Quiz
Quiz.description: This quiz will help you create a personalized marathon preparation plan.

questions.title: What is your current fitness level?

answers.title: Beginner: I have little to no running experience.
Intermediate: I can run a few kilometers without difficulty.
answers.prompt: can run a few kilometers without difficulty

answers.title: Advanced: I regularly run longer distances (e.g., half-marathons).

questions.title: Have you participated in a marathon or long-distance race before?

answers.title: Yes, I have completed a marathon.
No, I have never participated in a marathon or long-distance race.
answers.prompt: has never participated in a marathon or long-distance race

questions.title: How much time do you have before the marathon?

answers.title: Less than 3 months.
answers.prompt: has less than 3 months before the marathon

answers.title: More than 6 months.
answers.prompt: has more than 6 months before the marathon

questions.title: What is your primary goal for the marathon?

answers.title: Complete the marathon and cross the finish line.
answers.prompt: aims just to complete the marathon without a specific time goal

answers.title: Achieve a specific time goal (e.g., 4 hours).
answers.prompt: aims to complete the marathon in a specific time

answers.title: Improve my overall fitness and endurance.
answers.prompt: aims to improve overall fitness and endurance

questions.title: How many days per week are you willing to commit to running?

answers.title: 2-3 days per week.
answers.prompt: is willing to commit to running 2-3 days per week

answers.title: 4-5 days per week.
answers.prompt: is willing to commit to running 4-5 days per week

answers.title: 6 or more days per week.
answers.prompt: is willing to commit to running 6 or more days per week

questions.title: What is the longest distance you have run recently?

answers.title: Less than 5 kilometers (3.1 miles).
answers.prompt: the longest run they are able to complete is less than 5 kilometers

answers.title: 5-10 kilometers (3.1-6.2 miles).
answers.prompt: the longest run they are able to complete is 5-10 kilometers

answers.title: More than 10 kilometers (6.2 miles).
answers.prompt: the longest run they are able to complete is more than 10 kilometers

questions.title: Are you willing to incorporate cross-training exercises (e.g., strength training, stretching, yoga) into your training plan?

answers.title: Yes, I am open to cross-training exercises.
answers.prompt: wants to incorporate cross-training exercises into their training plan

answers.title: No, I prefer to focus solely on running.
answers.prompt: does not want to incorporate cross-training exercises into their training plan
